lines.content: Ben is a task management chatbot that helps you keep track of your todos, deadlines, and events â€” all from your command line.
Adds a task that must be done before/by a specific date.
Adds a task that occurs at a specific time.
Lists all tasks currently in your list.
Adds a simple task without a date/time.
* Entry point of the Ben task manager application.
* Initializes components and runs the main program loop,
* processing user input until the user exits.
